ecommerce-product-page: A view product page for an e-commerce website, featuring product images, descriptions, pricing, and an add-to-cart functionality.
chatmong-app: A real-time chat application that allows users to join chat rooms and communicate with others using WebSockets.
easybank-landing-page: A responsive landing page for Easybank, showcasing its features and services with modern design elements.
notes-app: A note-taking application that enables users to create, edit, and organize notes with cloud synchronization.
banking-system: A backend banking system that manages user accounts, transactions, and security using NestJS and PostgreSQL.
fylo-landing-page: A landing page for Fylo, highlighting its cloud storage solutions with a sleek and user-friendly interface.
